text: Hagi mago mago kafumofo agu'afina zasi koma atu knamo'ma vaganerege'za kini vahe'mo'za ha' vahe'zami'a ha' ome hunezamantaza kanagino, Deviti'a Joapune mika Israeli sondia vahetaminena hate viho huno huzmantege'za, zamagra vu'za Amoni vahera ome zamahe'za zamazeri haviza nehu'za, Raba kuma ome avazagi kagi'naze. Hianagi Deviti'a ana hatera ovuno, Jerusalemi mani'ne.
